Texts.Eng:
The Alrune are a mysterious race of rose-themed demonic humanoids, based heavily off the Alruna/Anurla Succubus and Incubus concept created by Alex Ahad for Gaia Online many years ago.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Resist: +^green;40^reset;% Fire, +^green;30^reset;% Poison, +^green;40^reset;% Shadow, +^green;40^reset;% Darkness
  Immune: Madness

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Atropus, Dark Atropus, Tentacle^reset; biomes: E. Regen +^green;40^reset;%, Speed +^green;5^reset%;
  ^green;Midnight, Penumbra, Lightless, Dark Tundra, Dark Sulphric, Dark Infernus, Dark Atropus^reset; biomes: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  ^red;Eden^reset; biomes: E. Regen -^red;50^reset;%

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Whip: Damage x^red;0.9^reset;, Crit Chance +^green;10^reset;%, Crit Damage +^green;15^reset;%
  Magnorb: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  Wands/Staves: Energy x^green;1.2^reset;, E. Regen +^green;10^reset;%, Defense -^red;5^reset;%, Speed +^green;10^reset;%

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.95^reset;
  Resist: -^red;30^reset;% Cold, -^red;5^reset;% Electricity
